name: sablier
description: Sablier is a self-hosted tool for managing time-based governance tasks for DAOs. It automates schedules, streams, and proposal processes through an intuitive web UI.

features.title: Dynamic Scaling
features.description: Automatically start and stop containers based on traffic to reduce resource usage and costs

features.title: Reverse Proxy Integration
features.description: Works seamlessly with Traefik and other proxies to manage container lifecycle

features.title: Session Persistence
features.description: Maintains user sessions during container startup with customizable loading pages

features.title: Multi
features.description: Choose between blocking, dynamic, or throttle strategies for different workload patterns

features.title: Resource Optimization
features.description: Reduces idle container overhead by shutting down unused services after configurable timeouts

features.title: Health Monitoring
features.description: Tracks container health and readiness before routing traffic to ensure reliability

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize loading screens with custom HTML, CSS, and branding during container startup

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatically manage container states and scaling policies via REST API
